recipes.name: Chicken Croquettes
instructions: Heat some oil in a pan.
Saute fry onions in it and then add minced meat.
Add salt, white pepper and mix well.
Cook them well and then put aside to let it cool.
Mash the potatoes and add chicken mixture in it.
Mix them all well and make small round shapes.
Roll them in plain flour, then in eggs, then in bread crumbs.
Serve with ketchup or any other dip.
